column4: OK. So I finish installing ubuntu-desktop. So I would like to use UltraVNC or VNCViewer client to connect to my server. What VNC should I install for this?
ssh? Is it better than VNC?
how is it better?
remote desktop viewer is already installed, just use that
how do I start it?
vinagre
How Would I start the viewer and then connect to it with my vnc client viewer?
did you enter vinagre ?
open a terminal and type vinagre
use vino-server
/usr/lib/vino/vino-server
how do I open and read that?
oops... what is the server  ? I assumed linux ...
I get "(vino-server:22004): Gtk-WARNING **: cannot open display:"
is the server ubuntu-server, or ubuntu-desktop ?
on the server ->  ps aux | grep vino
on the server ->  ps aux | grep X11
there's no X running ... ?
how do I get x to run?
should I do startx in the putty terminal window?
